ygData.subject: Re: Speaking of outrunning Selo's
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually, you can t outrun lions either.  The drum-unaided Selo s lets you run about as fast as a lion, which means if he s chewing on a party member you can
ygData.messageBody:
Actually, you can't outrun lions either. The drum-unaided Selo's lets
you run about as fast as a lion, which means if he's chewing on a party
member you can get away. Otherwise you're lion food.

-Manny



>From: "John Robertson" <johnr@...>
>
>
>A word of warning for any bards looking to play in the Oasis of Marr area,
>Lockjaw the crocodile is the only creature I have seen in EQ thus far that
can
>outrun a healthy bard with Selo's going. I'm sure there are others, but
this
>was the only one I have seen.
>
>To quantify a little:
>
>- I have tangled with Lockjaw twice (died once, zoned the other time only
>because I was very close)
>- I was healthy both times (no slow down because of low health)
>- I did not have a drum in my hand in either case
>
>Perhaps with a drum in hand you could outrun this nasty lizard, but I doubt
it.
>If anyone wants to go try running from him with and without a drum, be my
guest.
>
>Jyzan
>
>
